option.od: filenames of the SImage files to process.

synopsis.p: Extracts the start and end time of an SImage file or files.

description.p: Extracts the start and end time of an SImage file or files.
The start and end time of the image and the filename are written to standard output.

example.description: Extract the start and end time of all the SImage files in the current directory and store them in the file "time.txt".
